long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Welcome to CuratedML - Your Ultimate Learning Hub for Machine Learning and Data Science Professionals! 🚀

Embark on a journey of continuous learning and skill acquisition with CuratedML's Chrome Extension, designed to elevate your learning experience and propel your career to new heights.

Why Install CuratedML Chrome Extension?

🔐 Privacy-Focused:
Your privacy matters. Unlike other extensions, CuratedML's Chrome Extension prioritizes your privacy. We never track your browsing history unless you choose to share it, ensuring a secure and confidential learning environment.

📚 Effortless Bookmarking:
Save any website with ease! Use the extension, a shortcut (Cmd + Shift + e), or right-click on any text to add valuable resources to your library. Curate a personalized collection of AI-related bookmarks effortlessly.

📝 Real-Time Note-Taking:
Never let knowledge slip away. Take notes in real-time while reading resources. Capture insights, ideas, and important details to enhance your learning journey.

📂 Export Bookmarks:
Transition seamlessly into CuratedML. Export all your AI-related bookmarks with a single click, enabling us to tailor your learning journey. Rest assured, only AI-related bookmarks with selected keywords are saved to respect your privacy.

📚 Smart Recommendations:
Say goodbye to endless searches! Our extension intelligently recommends relevant content based on your interests and previously bookmarked resources, ensuring you always find the most valuable resources.


Transform your browsing experience into a personalized learning adventure. Install the CuratedML Chrome Extension now and propel your machine learning and data science skills to new heights!

Happy learning,
The CuratedML Team
